titleInfo.title: United States of America v. Gray et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Memorandum Opinion and Order: Defendant Telbs motion in limine 115 regarding evidence of the 2004 reelection campaign is denied. The government's motion in limine 116 regarding reference to the nature and detail of the victims alleged crimes is granted. Defendant Schmeltzs' motion in limine 120 regarding other crimes, wrongs or bad acts is granted. Defendants' joint motion regarding expert testimony 127 is granted as to the second branch regarding the Defendants' duties and responsibilities but denied 127 as to branches one, three, four and five. Judge David A. Katz on 9/3/2010. (C,D) Modified on 9/7/2010 (C,D).Memorandum Opinion and Order: Defendant Telbs motion in limine 115 regarding evidence of the 2004 reelection campaign is denied. The government's motion in limine 116 regarding reference to the nature and detail of the victims alleged crimes is granted. Defendant Schmeltzs' motion in limine 120 regarding other crimes, wrongs or bad acts is granted. Defendants' joint motion regarding expert testimony 127 is granted as to the second branch regarding the Defendants' duties and responsibilities but denied 127 as to branches one, three, four and five. Judge David A. Katz on 9/3/2010. (C,D) Modified on 9/7/2010 (C,D).Memorandum Opinion and Order: Defendant Telbs motion in limine 115 regarding evidence of the 2004 reelection campaign is denied. The government's motion in limine 116 regarding reference to the nature and detail of the victims alleged crimes is granted. Defendant Schmeltzs' motion in limine 120 regarding other crimes, wrongs or bad acts is granted. Defendants' joint motion regarding expert testimony 127 is granted as to the second branch regarding the Defendants' duties and responsibilities but denied 127 as to branches one, three, four and five. Judge David A. Katz on 9/3/2010. (C,D) Modified on 9/7/2010 (C,D).Memorandum Opinion and Order: Defendant Telbs motion in limine 115 regarding evidence of the 2004 reelection campaign is denied. Judge David A. Katz on 9/3/2010. (C,D) Modified on 9/7/2010 (C,D).
